name: The Social Disease of Intolerance
description: Intolerance and prejudice are a serious and contagious disease. Sometimes it is genetic, inherited from the tradition of rigid parents and ancestors, believers or atheists. Like a virus, it spreads by mutating rapidly, and deceives us by disguising itself as reasons, virtue and moral superiority. It becomes a deadly disease when it metastasizes and invades the key organs of our social body, which cannot be removed without risk to life.
